  • Type Parameters:
    T - Value Type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InputFormat<T,org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.mapreduce.wrapper.HadoopInputSplit>, org.apache.flink.api.java.typeutils.ResultTypeQueryable<T>, org.apache.flink.core.io.InputSplitSource<org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.mapreduce.wrapper.HadoopInputSplit>

    public class HadoopValueInputFormat<T>
extends org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.mapreduce.HadoopInputFormatBase<Void,T,T>
implements org.apache.flink.api.java.typeutils.ResultTypeQueryable<T>
    InputFormat implementation allowing to use Hadoop (mapreduce) InputFormats which don't provide a key with Flink.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
